donor_name: UNDP AS AA FOR JP PASS THROUGH
outputs.output_descr: The PI objective is to expand UNDP and UN's work in this area and formulate  a  comprehensive social inclusion programme.   The programme will assist different UN agencies in the country to review their activities in the area of social inclusion with the aim of identifying their niche in the broader country context aspiring towards EU. On the other hand the programme will be supporting the Government of Albania to identify its path and means to address social exclusion and disparities.

project_descr: Social Inclusion Support Programme - Initiation Plan
project_title: Social Inclusion Support Programme - Initiation Plan
